name: Hat_Game_Project02_SarswatJha
description: In the Drawing some Hats game the user will be started on a menu screen in which they can select from 3 options. Upon clicking play, they are required to click on the screen to spawn a 3D Object of a Hat. Upon any of the mouse clicks, the hat will be spawned, and the user can make changes to the hat according to the directions on the bottom left. A game component will be added based on the user click, if the user is able to spawn a certain number of hats, they will be greeted with a you win screen.
